name: Steps.Root
description: Used to guide users through a series of steps in a process
description_zh: Used to guide users through a series of steps in a process

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultStep.description: The initial value of the step

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The custom ids for the stepper elements
ids.description_zh: 步进器元素的自定义 ID

linear.description: If `true`, the stepper requires the user to complete the steps in order
linear.description_zh: 如果为“true”，则步进器要求用户按顺序完成步骤

modelValue.description: The v-model value of the step
